entries.journal_entry_description: Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find and activate the various miner markers which are located around the Smoking Forest.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker in the northern Jedi ruins and activate it.
entries.task02_message_box_text: Like the other ruins located around Mustafar, this ruin appeared after a major earthquake. It's in remarkably good shape; our geologists place its age to be at least 5000 years old.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the burning plains bridge and activate it.
entries.task04_message_box_text: Like the rest of the bridges on Mustafar, this bridge was built by the Klegger Corporation long before the start of the Clone Wars to connect the Smoking Forest to the Burning Plains.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the field miner camp and activate it.
entries.task06_message_box_text: Mines like those in the Smoking Forest are very rare on Mustafar because they actually involve digging into the lava rock to extract minerals. While much harder than lava mining, the mines in the Smoking Forest produce some very rich veins of raw materials.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker in the southern Jedi ruins and activate it.
entries.task08_message_box_text: These ruins were uncovered roughly 18 years after the end of the Clone Wars. Mustafar simply shifted, and they were revealed. Offworlders have become very excited by the discovery of these ruins and others like them.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker in the western portion of the smoking forest and activate it.
entries.task10_message_box_text: The smoking forest was once thick with the black smoke that was released by giant rock formations. Over time, the formations sealed off, and they eventually toppled down.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: There are five markers located throughout the smoking forest, located to the northwest of the Mensix Mining Facility. Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find all five of them and check the information on them.
